About

Hey! I’m a software developer from Vancouver, Canada.

Currently, I’m taking a break from coding and reflecting on my experiences. I’ll be back soon!

I was previously the CTO at bigmama.ca, where the team and I built out and maintained our Ruby on Rails/Spree Commerce application.

I co-organize the Code and Coffee (Vancouver) Meetup, which is meant to help developers carve out time to work on personal projects.

I also mentor and instruct for Ladies Learning Code.

I grow vegetables on my 2x8 ft balcony, and am mother to two sassy little girls, aged 2 and 4.

Tweet me at @jncoops, read my code on GitHub, find my CV on LinkedIn.

Have a nice day. â™¥
